title: NIT Karnataka Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Project Associate Posts
description: The National Institute of Technology Karnataka (NIT Karnataka) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech. can grab this chance and apply for the NIT Karnataka Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the w...
